Text: Oh nice been waiting for this! Havent been sure if the game is worth the money or not, but if anyone thinks that heres the homepage: http://www.benjaminrivers.com/games/home/ Remember if you like it, support it!
Working like a charm and fast download! Thanks!
Very welcome markofbear. I've played it a bit myself, so far I've seen 2 endings.

I don't usually play 2d games, i'll give it a shot because its a horror game. :P

Thanks for the upload!
Seed to 2.0 ratio. I will buy the game if it fun enough.
Can you always upload actual version when it comes out?
@openarena, this is the actual download, and it is also the most recent release.

@openarena Maybe you are confused. It says here http://www.benjaminrivers.com/games/home/contact-support.html
very clearly that the most recent version is 1.3.1, which is the version uploaded here. It was updated on August 17th.

Hey folks!

This is Benjamin Rivers, the developer of Home. Just wanted to pop in and say "hi"âI noticed you all in my traffic reports. :-)

Torrenting Home is not illegal (thanks to the Creative Commons license it's under), but as Markofbear said, if you dig it, I do hope you support it on Steam!

Either way, thanks for playing,
B.
@Lestrade, if you are the developer, just wanted to say good job with the game. For a 2D story-driven horror game, it does a lot with what it can. I did buy it, of course. ;)
Thanks, debugman18! I am indeed the developer.
